title: L'Oreal Paris Age Perfect Glow Renewal Facial Oil, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
description: Restore skin's youthful glow with Age Perfect Glow Renewal Facial Oil. It deeply nourishes and replenishes dull, dry skin with a unique blend of 8 Essential oils. The non-greasy and luxuriously lightweight formula absorbs quickly for all-day hydration.  All you need is 4-5 drops each time you apply. Apply alone, after cleansed skin; right before applying cream; at night before bedtime; apply on the neck; or apply right before foundation to improve glide.

title: L'Oreal Excellence Creme Haircolor, Medium Blonde 8
description: For soft, luminous streaks of light discover excellence crème lights. The gentle, non-drip formula lets you create creamy, beautifully blended highlights in a few simple steps.  The result: rich, radiant highlights and not a gray in sight.

title: NYX Eyebrow Cake Powder, Black/Gray
description: Our recipe for cooking up exquisite eyebrows includes wax, tools and a pair of complementary powders, black and gray, which can be customized to create the ideal shade. Each eyebrow cake powder kit includes a slanted brush and a round wand to shape, style and tame eyebrows.

title: Physicians Formula Happy Booster Happy Glow Multi-Colored Face Powder and Bronzer, Light Bronzer - 0.3 OZ

title: Banana Boat Sport SPF 50 Family Size Sunscreen Lotion, 12-Fluid Ounce
Neutrogena Naturals Acne Spot Treatment, 0.75 Ounce
description: Clinically proven acne medicine treats and helps prevent breakouts. Fortified with an acne fighting bionutrient naturally-derived from the wintergreen leaf for clear, healthy looking skin. With powerful naturally-derived salicylic acid, this spot treatment penetrates down into pores to treat breakouts and help prevent breakouts. Wintergreen is a source of naturally-derived salicylic acid that treats and helps prevent acne and blackheads. Product uses 94% naturally derived ingredients and packaging is comprised of 48% Post Consumer Recycled (PCR) Content. Supports Clean Water: We partnered with the Nature Conservancy, a global organization dedicated to protecting natural sources of clean water for people, plants and animals.
